projectGridLines.stationName: Centre for Effective Governance of Indian States - Telangana State Team, Hyderabad
projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Telangana School Education Project  & Project 2  Title: Telangana School Education Project
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Telangana School Education Project

Description: Analyze correlation between student attendance and learning outcomes

Skill sets: Data Analysis and must have working knowledge of STATA or R

Traits expectation: Trustworthy, Committed, and willing to learn

Expected learning: Learn about School Education sector and role of studentâ€™s attendance in academic performance.

Specific courses required for project execution: Research & Data Analysis 

Estimated Time: ~2 months

Project 2

Title: Telangana School Education Project

Description: Capture Best Practices on Governance related interventions to improve School Education Outcomes from across Indian States. 

Skill sets: Research (Especially Secondary research) and Documentation

Traits expectation: Trustworthy, Committed and Willing to learn

Expected learning: Conducting Secondary Research and documenting 

Specific courses required for project execution: Research 

Estimated Time: ~2 Months
